name: Moorhuhn Adventure: Der Schatz des Pharao
name_original: Moorhuhn Adventure: Der Schatz des Pharao
description:
Moorhuhn Adventure: Der Schatz des Pharao is an adventure game developed by Phenomedia Publishing. It was originally released in 2004. Phenomedia Publishing published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Moorhuhn Adventure: Der Schatz des Pharao on PC.
